wikipedia_page.main: Willie Brayshaw Yeadon (28 June 1907 – 16 January 1997), was a British railway historian known for his magnum opus, Yeadon's Register of LNER Locomotives and other works.

response: * Willie Yeadon, Yeadon's Register of LNER Locomotives Vol.9: Gresley 8-Coupled Engines, classes O1, O2, P1, P2 and U1. Challenger Publications, 1995. ISBN
* Willie Yeadon Yeadon's Register of LNER locomotives Vol 20: Class Q1, Q2, Q3 & Q4, & The Q1 Tank
